column4: People, plz, question: I set up "Background transparent" to true in xchat-gnome and now he not running! :(
You are ignoring me? o_O
do u mean that xchat doesn't work at all?
have you tried closing it and restarting it?
why don't you use just xchat instead of xchat-gnome?
installing xchat-gnome to see.
well, i haven't any idea, I'm using xchat-gnome and I set the transparency but it works here.
I don't know. Can you unset the transparency? This is why I use xchat, it's more powerful with more options.
are u using an accerlerated desktop?
yes, compiz is an accerlerated desktop. I don't know is that makes a difference. It means you have visual effects turned on.
it it working?
are u transparent? :-))
ah, come on, don't be shy. :-)). Although I don't use it either.
well, unlikely that xchat is broken, maybe something on your system, dependencies, who knows?
well, your English is fine. Better than my Russian. :-)
how did you install the programs, with synaptic or the terminal?
nyet.
if you installed xchat-gnome using the console, try using synaptic to uninstall and maybe reinstall.
what time is it in Russia?
aha, here it is 23:30, USA Eastern
try using synaptic to uninstall xchat-gnome and then reinstall it and see what happens
excellent.
